column5: Sorry to hear of your loss, Ron. My condolences, and I'll be thinking of you and your family tonight.  Brian

Thank you very much for your kind thoughts, flowers and all the emails.  It is a great relief to have friends like you to help in such times.  The last few days our family has been going through things our Mom had. It brought back lots of great memories and anyone that knows me certainly knows there was lots of laughter. I think I now know where I got my jouster personality form. Every picture we looked at had a funny story. We frequently brought out the photos and reminisced often, long before Mom was ill. One thing that touched our hearts with Mom was the collection of silly little nicknack's we had gotten for her over the years. To see such a lady holding on to these keep sakes really took hold of us all. I think the most cherished one would be a poem one of my brothers gave to her many moons ago, it was laminated on a plaque and was on top of the cupboard with all the pictures. Mom knew we would like to read this at this time.   GOD bless all.  Cheers, Ron
sniff, sniff...
Always hate hearing this kind of news. Ron, Lot of friends have your back during times like this.  My condolences
Dreading the day I have to go through that.   Allow me to pass on my condolences as well.
Sorry to hear about your lost Ron. My condolences.
Sorry to hear about your loss, my condolences to you and your family Ron
Some of you may know already, Ron Reyns' Mom passed yesterday. Our thought's and prayers go out to Ron and his family.  http://www.maccoubrey.com/schedule.asp?id=1850
I'm sorry to hear of your loss, Ron.  Prayers and best wishes to you and your family.
sorry for your loss Ron  Thoughts and prayers to you and yours  dave
Our sincerest condolences to you and your family Ron.
That is indeed sad news, my condolences Ron.
sorry to hear Ron our thoughts are with you
My condolences...sorry to here that....

Having recently gone through this myself, my sincere condolences to you and yours also Ron.  Moms are the best. But there is a big hole in our lives when they unexpectedly leave us.  Be well Ron, and remember your mom often.
So sorry to hear this Ron. Sincere condolences from Sis and I.
wow, that's rough Ron, I'm so sorry.  I can't imagine losing my mom.  My heart goes out to you at this sad time.  Joey
My condolences to you and your family Ron  Maureen
Ron sorry to here of your loss our thoughts are with you and the family.
Very sad news. Condolences from J and I to you and your family, Ron.  Take care of yourself my friend.
Deepest condolences Ron. Been a long battle and she's not suffering anymore. Think of the good times and do what she told you to do.... follow your dreams and be happy.  Wayne and Leah
So very sorry to hear that Ron, and deepest condolances.  I know exactly how your feeling though Bud, I just buried my own Mom 3 days ago.
Terrible news. Thoughts and prayer are with you Ron and your family. Sorry to hear.
thoughts are with you.
There is a huge hole left when we bury a loved one; best thing I have found to fill that hole is memories. Our thoughts and prayers are with you and the rest of the family!  Cliff & Sue
Very sorry to read this news Ron, my deepest condolences to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family.  - Mark
Sorry to hear this news Ron...  A guy's best friend is his mom...
Sad news for sure.... sincerest condolences to you and your family
I'm truly saddened to hear this Ron. Talk to you soon.
My condolences Ron.
Condolences to you and yours Ron.  Sinker
